Dataset Summary:
- Valid images: 2930
- Valid bounding boxes: 3804
- Skipped zero-area boxes: 1131

Dataset Summary:
- Valid images: 297
- Valid bounding boxes: 419
- Skipped zero-area boxes: 163


def train(model, train_ann_file, val_ann_file, epochs=1, 
          save_path='D:/Deep_Learning/Grounding-Dino-FineTuning/weights_myds',
          save_epoch=5, early_stop_patience=10):
    """Enhanced training with stabilization techniques"""
    
    # Create save directory
    os.makedirs(save_path, exist_ok=True)
    
    # Read datasets
    train_ann_Dict = read_dataset(train_ann_file)
    val_ann_Dict = read_dataset(val_ann_file) if val_ann_file else None
    visualize_annotations(train_ann_Dict)
    
    # Setup optimizer with lower initial LR and weight decay
    optimizer = optim.AdamW(model.parameters(), lr=5e-6, weight_decay=1e-4)  # Changed to AdamW


Mo: Ppt prep
Tu: Gdino training
